snippet: After enduring rape and pregnancy as a young girl, Wendolyn Colon wants to one day counsel girls who have been sexually abused.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Dean Parsons and Wendolyn Colon buy furniture.
lead_paragraph: After enduring rape and pregnancy as a young girl, Wendolyn Colon wants to one day counsel girls who have been sexually abused.

headline.seo: An Abuse Survivor Has a Vision to Help
headline.main: Abuse Survivor Wants to Counsel Girls
headline.print_headline: Abuse Survivor Wants to Counsel Girls

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
